title: Teriyaki Chicken
content:
# Teriyaki Chicken

A classic sweet and savory dish.

## Ingredients
* Chicken Breasts
* Soy Sauce
* Ginger
* Honey

## Instructions
1. Slice chicken into thin strips.
2. Whisk soy sauce and honey in a bowl.
3. Sauté chicken until browned, then add sauce.

## Teacher's Tip
Always use a meat thermometer to ensure chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
